I'm so distraught. My {@LinkCreature:216#1010#husband} was a wonderful man...then came the Ceremony of Blessing...he was so curious, he had to see.

He seemed nervous when he returned. He woke up screaming in the middle of the night. The same night many vampirs started to change.

Please...find him. He may not have fully made the change. We may seem monstrous to you, but I assure you, we love the same as you.

Who...who are you? I'm not like the others...yet. Please just leave me in peace.

Alethea? Oh dear, no. I can't go back. The change will take me, and then...I can't even think of it.

Here. Take this letter to her. Please...don't ask me to come back again.

No. No, that's...

Lene. Lene will know what to do. Will you ask her to help?

Alethea...that's quite a tale.

Yes, I do know of a way to save Sadnica. It will be dangerous, though.

I'll need your help.
